title: Beautiful autumn scenery in Handan, Hebei
text:
By Zhang Yu in Shijiazhuang | chinadaily.com.cn | Updated: 2019-10-24 14:21

A photo taken Saturday shows the scenery of Daxiagu, part of northern China's Taihang mountains, in Shexian county, Handan, Hebei province. [Photos by Zhou Jinli and Yang Yanzhong/for chinadaily.com.cn]

The most beautiful time of the year has come for Daxiagu, part of northern China's Taihang mountains, in Shexian county, Handan, Hebei province. There, red tree leaves and other colorful plants grow all over the mountain.

Many tourists climb the mountain to appreciate its picturesque autumn landscape.
